metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46322 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Duktape v2.99.99 was discovered to contain a SEGV vulnerability via thecomponent duk_push_tval in duktape/duk_api_stack.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46322` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

duktape - 2.7.0-1
libduktape207 - 2.7.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: duktape package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.0-1').
